programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australia‚Äôs rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built To Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australia‚Äôs woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australia‚Äôs most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. This legendary serpent has a plethora of assets - venom, agility, speed and sensory superpowers - that make it a master its habitat, despite being the most hated serpent in Africa.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From a muskrat attack to a cat missing an eye, the clinic is full of surprises. Dr. Pol rushes to an Amish farm to help a cow thats been in labor for 24 hours, and Dr. Nicole treats her dogs injured leg. Dr. Brenda gives step-by-step care instructions to a family new to raising Scottish Highland cows, and Dr. Lisa does a dental exam on Elvis the donkey. Dr. Nicole shares exciting news! .

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are amazed by the respect Indian locals have for their venomous scaled neighbors. Shyam‚Äôs son, Surya, is breaking concrete steps to help Simon and Sioux finally capture a rat snake. Then, the duo teams with Gowri Shanker to catch and release not one but two enormous king cobras.

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: A dangerous heatwave surges across India, which means more deadly snakes are on the move looking for shelter. programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers are one of the most feared snake families in the world. Now their stories reveal just how troubled life can be for hated snakes. Rattlesnakes in the desert cheat death by predators and people. Puffadders clean up vermin, yet face persecution. And gaboon vipers on the forest floor dare not move. programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Charmed by some, feared by most ‚Äì the cobra family is powerful and iconic. programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdom‚Äôs worst parents, the underdogs.
